channel.title: Pokemon Go on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Pokemon Go on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Charmeleon Chaos Theory
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: There’s something wild about watching people play this game that everyone won’t shut up about. And I think it has a lot to do with how it shifts social order in an unexpected way. Here’s why: If you see a group of people standing in an otherwise empty park, all from different walks of life, brought together by this game, it looks spontaneous from a distanceâ€”totally unplanned, as if they all stumbled there independently.
